emerson-air-conditioner.title: Air Conditioner (Emerson)
emerson-air-conditioner.text: This has worked well for me for over a year.

wen-belt-and-disc-sander.title: Belt & Disc Sander (Wen)
wen-belt-and-disc-sander.text: If you get one of these, see my video on changing the original sanding disc.

branding-iron.title: Branding Iron
branding-iron.text: I have 2 of these, and they're great.

cabinet-scraper.title: Cabinet Scraper
cabinet-scraper.text: Great for scraping off glue squeeze-out, and other things.

caliper-digital.title: Caliper - Digital
caliper-digital.text: Features metric, fractional inches, decimal inches, with a nice case.

caliper-fractional-dial.title: Caliper - Fractional Dial
caliper-fractional-dial.text: Highly rated analog caliper. Nice case.

camera-canon-powershot-sx610-hs.title: Camera - Canon PowerShot SX610 HS
camera-canon-powershot-sx610-hs.text: Nice little point-and-shoot camera that served me well for years.

canary-corrugated-cardboard-cutter.title: Canary Corrugated Cardboard Cutter
canary-corrugated-cardboard-cutter.text: Great for cutting up standard-thickness cardboard boxes. Hard to cut yourself.

care-and-repair-of-shop-machines-book.title: Care & Repair of Shop Machines - Book
care-and-repair-of-shop-machines-book.text: Slightly outdated, but still filled with some great stuff.

low-profile-casters.title: Casters - Low Profile
low-profile-casters.text: These are great if all you want is to move something in a straight line. And they hold a lot of weight.

center-hole-punch.title: Center Hole Punch
center-hole-punch.text: I like this adjustable center punch, but since you adjust it by turning the red handle, the handle has a tendency to come unscrewed. So I used some Loctite on one punch for normal use, and bought a second punch for when I need to adjust it.

rockler-clamp-it-corner-clamping-jig.title: Clamp-It Corner Clamping Jig (Rockler)
rockler-clamp-it-corner-clamping-jig.text: If you're not going to build your own corner clamp, then this is a good alternative. You'll need one of these squares also.

rockler-clamp-it-square.title: Clamp-It Square (Rockler)
rockler-clamp-it-square.text: You can use these by themselves, but more often they're used with this corner clamping jig.

collet-extension.title: Collet Extension
collet-extension.text: Reasonably priced collet extension. I haven't tried it.

contour-sanding-grips.title: Contour Sanding Grips
contour-sanding-grips.text: Great for sanding edges and inside curves.

coupling-nut-1_4-20-x-1-50.title: Coupling Nut - 1/4-20 x 1" box of 50
coupling-nut-1_4-20-x-1-50.text: I use these when I make knobs. See my video for more information.

analog-dial-indicator.title: Dial Indicator Gauge - Analog
analog-dial-indicator.text: This isn't the one I use, but it's a good price and has decent reviews.

analog-dial-indicator-and-base.title: Dial Indicator Gauge - Analog - & Magnetic Base
analog-dial-indicator-and-base.text: This is actually a pretty good deal.

digital-dial-indicator.title: Dial Indicator Gauge - Digital
digital-dial-indicator.text: This isn’t the one I use, but this looks like it’s a better gauge, and it’s a good price.

makita-drill.title: Drill (Makita)
makita-drill.text: This isn’t my exact model, but it’s close.

brad-point-drill-bits.title: Drill Bit Set - Brad Point (Rockler)
brad-point-drill-bits.text: A reasonably decent set of bits, but read my blog post first.

countersink-drill-bits-dewalt.title: Drill Bit Set - Countersink (DEWALT)
countersink-drill-bits-dewalt.text: I love these tapered countersink bits. They even have replacement bits available if you break one.

countersink-drill-bits-snappy.title: Drill Bit Set - Countersink (Snappy)
countersink-drill-bits-snappy.text: A friend of mine recommends these - he swears by them.

forstner-bits-14-piece-porter-cable.title: Drill Bit Set - Forstner - 14 Piece (Porter-Cable)
forstner-bits-14-piece-porter-cable.text: I haven't tried these, but it looks like a good set.

harbor-freight-3-pc-hole-saw-set.title: Drill Bit Set - Hole Saw Set - 3 Piece (Harbor Freight)
harbor-freight-3-pc-hole-saw-set.text: I use these for my drill press table. Cut the insert hole with the 4" saw; cut new inserts with the 4 1/4" saw, and just a teeny amount of sanding.

self-centering-drill-bits-bosch.title: Drill Bit Set - Self-Centering (Bosch)
self-centering-drill-bits-bosch.text: These aren't the same brand I use, but they look identical.

drill-press-return-spring.title: Drill Press Return Spring
drill-press-return-spring.text: See my video on fixing my broken drill press return spring.

drill-press-vise-tekton.title: Drill Press Vise (4") (TEKTON)
drill-press-vise-tekton.text: This is the drill press vise I use, and I like it.

dust-deputy-and-bucket.title: Dust Deputy & Bucket
dust-deputy-and-bucket.text: If you don't want to bother with setting up your own bucket, this is the way to go.

dust-mask.title: Dust Mask
dust-mask.text: This is the dust mask I use. It fits my face really well, and doesn't fog my glasses.

dust-port-universal-rockler.title: Dust Port (Rockler)
dust-port-universal-rockler.text: I'm sure there are others out there, this is just the one I used.

dust-right-small-port-host-kit.title: Dust Right Small Port Host Kit
dust-right-small-port-host-kit.text: I use this with my router table.

epoxy-glue-gorilla.title: Epoxy Glue (Gorilla)
epoxy-glue-gorilla.text: The only kind of epoxy glue I use.

featherboards-drillpro.title: Featherboards (Drillpro)
featherboards-drillpro.text: These are nice because they're long, which helps if your miter slot is farther from your blade than normal.

fence-clamps-milescraft.title: Fence Clamps (Milescraft)
fence-clamps-milescraft.text: I haven't tried these, but they're cheap enough, and have good reviews.

fence-clamps-powertec.title: Fence Clamps (Powertec)
fence-clamps-powertec.text: I haven't tried these, but they're cheaper than the Rockler ones, and they have good reviews.

fence-clamps-rockler.title: Fence Clamps (Rockler)
fence-clamps-rockler.text: These are what I use, but there's cheaper ones available.

flexform-hose-only-2-1_2-rockler.title: FlexForm Hose (only) - 2 1/2" (Rockler)
flexform-hose-only-2-1_2-rockler.text: This is the 2 1/2" hose only, without the adapters.

flexform-hose-only-4-rockler.title: FlexForm Hose (only) - 4" (Rockler)
flexform-hose-only-4-rockler.text: This is the 4" hose only, without the adapters.

flexform-hose-kit-2-1_2-rockler.title: FlexForm Hose Kit - 2 1/2" (Rockler)
flexform-hose-kit-2-1_2-rockler.text: I love this. See my video on my drill press dust collection

flip-stop-2-1_4-rockler.title: Flip Stop - 2 1/4" (Rockler)
flip-stop-2-1_4-rockler.text: I use this on my drill press fence, and one of my cross-cut sleds.

glue-stick-repositionable-elmers.title: Glue Stick - Repositionable (Elmer’s)
glue-stick-repositionable-elmers.text: Great for temporarily gluing patterns on wood.

gooseneck-mirror.title: Gooseneck Mirror
gooseneck-mirror.text: See my camera monitor video for how I use this.

hack-saw-stanely.title: Hack Saw (Stanely)
hack-saw-stanely.text: I could only find a 2-pack for this, but at least it's not very expensive.

heat-gun-steinel.title: Heat Gun (Steinel)
heat-gun-steinel.text: Yes, this is WAY too expensive, but I love mine.

digital-height-gauge-wixey.title: Height Gauge (Digital) (Wixey)
digital-height-gauge-wixey.text: Nice gauge for setting the height of a blade or bit.

hex-key-set-workpro.title: Hex Key Set (Workpro)
hex-key-set-workpro.text: This is a great set of hex keys I use. It includes a case, and both SAE and Metric hex keys.

hex-key-set-metric-tekton.title: Hex Key Set - Metric (Tekton)
hex-key-set-metric-tekton.text: Decent hex key set if all you need is metric.

milwaukee-quick-change-hole-saw-arbor.title: Hole Saw Arbor (Pilot Bit) - Quick-Change (Milwaukee)
milwaukee-quick-change-hole-saw-arbor.text: This is my favorite by far. Easy to use with only your hands.

incra-12-inch-precision-marking-t-rule.title: Incra 12" Precision Marking T-Rule
incra-12-inch-precision-marking-t-rule.text: I use this 12" version, but you can also get the 6" version from this link. You’ll need a pencil with a fine point.

incra-6-inch-precision-marking-t-rule.title: Incra 6" Precision Marking T-Rule
incra-6-inch-precision-marking-t-rule.text: I love this tool! I have the 12" version, but this is problably fine for most cases. You’ll need a pencil with a fine point.

insert-nut-type-d-1_4-20-x-20mm-12-hillm.title: Insert Nut - Type D - 1/4-20 x 20mm (12-pack) (Hillman)
insert-nut-type-d-1_4-20-x-20mm-12-hillm.text: This is the kind with a flange.

insert-nut-type-e-1_4-20-x-20mm-50-e-z-l.title: Insert Nut - Type E - 1/4-20 x 20mm (50-pack) (E-Z LOK)
insert-nut-type-e-1_4-20-x-20mm-50-e-z-l.text: This is the kind without a flange.

led-shop-lights.title: LED Shop Lights
led-shop-lights.text: These are what I use in my shop, and I really like them.

lid-opener.title: Lid Opener
lid-opener.text: Best little tool in my shop. Well, maybe not, but it's definitely awesome.

loctite-threadlocker-blue.title: Loctite Threadlocker Blue
loctite-threadlocker-blue.text: The "Blue" version lets you unscrew the screw if you need to.

magnetic-base-for-dial-indicator-hf.title: Magnetic Base for Dial Indicators
magnetic-base-for-dial-indicator-hf.text: Always use a coupon at Harbor Freight. The 20% off one, or if you’re lucky, a 25% off one.

magnetic-parts-tray.title: Magnetic Parts Tray
magnetic-parts-tray.text: I have 3 of these, although I got them from Harbor Freight. Love them.

magswitch-magjig-95.title: Magnetic Switch
magswitch-magjig-95.text: A nice, dependable, fairly strong magnetic switch. Turn the knob to engage or disengage the magnet.

magnetic-telescoping-flashlight.title: Magnetic Telescoping Flashlight
magnetic-telescoping-flashlight.text: Very useful. Even though the magnet's not very strong, and the light's not very bright, both are good enough to get the job done.

micro-jig-grr-ripper.title: Micro Jig Grr-Ripper
micro-jig-grr-ripper.text: Overpriced but invaluable, if that makes any sense. I have 2.

micro-jig-grr-ripper-1_8-leg.title: Micro Jig Grr-Ripper 1/8" Leg
micro-jig-grr-ripper-1_8-leg.text: Extremely useful accessory for the Micro Jig Grr-Ripper.

micro-jig-zeroplay-miter-bar.title: Miter Bar (Micro Jig ZeroPlay)
micro-jig-zeroplay-miter-bar.text: If you can't make your own runners, this is a great option.

johnson-paste-wax.title: Paste Wax (Johnson)
johnson-paste-wax.text: I love this on my cast iron table top.

plane-blade.title: Plane Blade
plane-blade.text: Standard bench plane blade, reasonably priced

power-tool-switch-rockler.title: Power Tool Switch (Rockler)
power-tool-switch-rockler.text: Sometimes this is on sale at Rockler, so check there first.

precision-steel-squares-kaufhof.title: Precision Steel Squares (Kaufhof)
precision-steel-squares-kaufhof.text: I love these. Nice box, too.

radius-quick-jigs.title: Radius Quick-Jigs
radius-quick-jigs.text: Use with a router to cut rounded corners ov various sizes.

makita-random-orbital-sander.title: Random Orbital Sander (Makita)
makita-random-orbital-sander.text: Works great for me. I wish the dust collection port was a little larger. but it's good enough.

rotary-tool-kit-wen.title: Rotary Tool Kit (WEN)
rotary-tool-kit-wen.text: Like a Dremel, but cheaper (both in cost and quality).

router-bit-and-saw-blade-cleaning-kit-ro.title: Router Bit & Saw Blade Cleaning Kit (Rockler)

freud-tongue-&-groove-router-bit-set.title: Router Bit Set - 1/2" Shank - Tongue & Groove (Freud)
freud-tongue-&-groove-router-bit-set.text: See my video for a review of these bits.

freud-box-joint-cutter-set.title: Saw Blade - Box Joint Cutter Set (Freud)
freud-box-joint-cutter-set.text: Great for cutting 1/4" or 3/8" box joints. This may not be a good choice for using with a SawStop.

freud-diablo-combination-saw-blade.title: Saw Blade - Combination (Freud Diablo)
freud-diablo-combination-saw-blade.text: The version I use doesn't seem to be on Amazon right now, but this is close.

sawstop-jobsite-saw-dado-zero-clearance-.title: SawStop JobSite Saw Dado Zero Clearance Insert Plate

sawstop-jobsite-table-saw-amazon.title: SawStop JobSite Table Saw (Amazon)
sawstop-jobsite-table-saw-amazon.text: I used this for a couple of years, and it's great.

sawstop-pcs.title: SawStop PCS
sawstop-pcs.text: No, I don’t expect anyone to buy this from my link, but hey, you never know.

screwdriver-stanley.title: Screwdriver (Stanley)
screwdriver-stanley.text: Just a simple, inexpensive screwdriver, with multiple bits. And it ratchets.

grk-screws-_8-1-1_2.title: Screws - GRK - #8 x 1 1/2"
grk-screws-_8-1-1_2.text: I either use these or Spax screws, and both are the best.

grk-screws-_8-1-1_4.title: Screws - GRK - #8 x 1 1/4"
grk-screws-_8-1-1_4.text: I either use these or Spax screws, and both are the best.

machine-screw-pan-head-1-4x1-2-box-50.title: Screws - Machine
machine-screw-pan-head-1-4x1-2-box-50.text: Box of 50 1/4" x 1/2" zpan-head machine screws.

sharpening-hone-double-sided.title: Sharpening Hone - Double-Sided
sharpening-hone-double-sided.text: This works well for me, and I like that the handles close to make a little case.

rockler-silicone-glue-brush.title: Silicone Glue Brush (Rockler)
rockler-silicone-glue-brush.text: Just let the glue dry a little, and it peels right off.

silicone-project-mat.title: Silicone Project Mat (Rockler)
silicone-project-mat.text: Great mat for gluing, or just protecting a surface.

skateboard-bearings-reds.title: Skateboard Bearings (Reds)
skateboard-bearings-reds.text: 8 pack of very reliable skateboard bearings

socket-set-stanley-99-piece.title: Socket Set - Stanley 99 piece
socket-set-stanley-99-piece.text: I love this socket set, and the case is really nice, except I had to cut a piece of cardboard to go inside, to keep the top tools from falling out.

speed-squares-7-12-swanson.title: Speed Squares -7" & 12" (Swanson)
speed-squares-7-12-swanson.text: Swanson invented the speed square, and they're still the best.

steel-rod-1_2-x-10.title: Steel Rod (1/2" x 10")
steel-rod-1_2-x-10.text: I use this to align my router to the router table top.

bessey-strap-clamp.title: Strap Clamp (Bessey)
bessey-strap-clamp.text: Great clamp strap for gluing carcasses and boxes.

bessey-strap-clamp-clips.title: Strap Clamp Clips (Bessey)
bessey-strap-clamp-clips.text: Clips for the Bessey Strap Clamp, can be used with other straps.

tap-magic.title: Tap Magic
tap-magic.text: This stuff is awesome when you have to drill metal.

scotch-indoor-mounting-tape.title: Tape - Indoor Mounting (Scotch)
scotch-indoor-mounting-tape.text: Double-sided tape. It's removable, but it can be fairly strong, too. It's thick, though, so be aware of that.

threaded-insert-1-4x1-2-no-flange-zinc-b.title: Threaded Inserts
threaded-insert-1-4x1-2-no-flange-zinc-b.text: Box of 100 1/4"-20 x 1/2" zinc threaded inserts with no flanges.

tool-drawer-liner-hf.title: Tool Drawer Liner (Harbor Freight)
tool-drawer-liner-hf.text: Always use a coupon at Harbor Freight. The 20% off one, or if you’re lucky, a 25% off one.

tool-drawer-liner-hd.title: Tool Drawer Liner (Home Depot)
tool-drawer-liner-hd.text: This is a Home Depot link, and it’s the liner that I use.

vacuum-craftsman-xsp-12-gallon-5.5-peak-.title: Vacuum - Craftsman XSP 12 Gallon 5.5 Peak HP

dust-right-vacuum-hose-2-1_2-expandable.title: Vacuum Hose - 2 1/2" Expandable (Dust Right)
dust-right-vacuum-hose-2-1_2-expandable.text: I have two of these, and I love them.

wen-6-inch-waxer_polisher.title: Waxer/Polisher - 6-Inch (WEN)
wen-6-inch-waxer_polisher.text: Not very powerful, but it gets the job done for my cast iron table top.

wixey-wr700.title: Wixey Saw Fence Digital Readout (Gauge)
wixey-wr700.text: See my articles on this great product.
